fields.name: __**FOUND FOOTAGE FAQ PAGE**__
fields.value:
Here are the frequently asked questions about the Found Footage mod, please select an option below
 Go back to the start by clicking "Back to Home"

fields.name: KNOWN UNSOLVABLE ISSUES
fields.value:
• The mod does NOT work with integrated graphics
• The mod does NOT work on MacOS (due to OpenGL requirements)
• The mod does NOT work with Sodium, Iris or any other performance mod that changes rendering
• The mod does NOT work on Forge or Neoforge
• The mod requires Fabric loader
• Do NOT use Fabulous! graphics - only Fast or Fancy work

These issues CANNOT be fixed as they are engine limitations!

fields.name: What do I need to install?
fields.value:
Required dependencies for Minecraft 1.20.1:
• Fabric API (any version)
• Simple Voice Chat (1.20.1-2.4.32 or later)
• GeckoLib (4.4.9 or later)

Make sure you're using Fabric loader, NOT Forge/Neoforge!

fields.name: Graphics Settings Requirements
fields.value:
• Use Fast or Fancy graphics only
• Do NOT use Fabulous! graphics
• Do NOT use Sodium/Iris or other performance mods
• The mod may not work with integrated graphics

fields.name: How do I enter the Backrooms?
fields.value:
Suffocate yourself in any way for long enough and you'll noclip into the Backrooms. You'll need to travel through all 4 levels to escape:

1. Level 0 - The classic Backrooms
2. Level 1 - The Habitable Zone
3. Level 2 - Pipe Dreams
4. The Poolrooms
5. The Infinite Grass Field

fields.name: Skinwalker Not Spawning?
fields.value:
The skinwalker does not spawn naturally in singleplayer (this is intentional).

You can use these commands if needed:
• /skinwalker <target> - Makes skinwalker take target's skin
• /release <target> - Releases target from skinwalker
• /backroomsevent <event> - Manually triggers an event
• /gimmemyinventoryback <target> - Restores saved inventory

fields.name: How do I use the flashlight?
fields.value: Press R to toggle your flashlight on/off.

fields.name: About the Shaders/Visual Effects
fields.value:
• The shaders and visual effects are built into the mod
• You cannot remove or disable them - they're part of the core experience
• The mod uses Veil for these effects (already included)
• Make sure you don't remove Veil's deferred resource pack

fields.name: Why does my game crash on world load?
fields.value: Either you have an incompatible mod, or you use integrated graphics

fields.name: Where are the shaders?
fields.value: The shaders are built in

fields.name: How do I play with friends?
fields.value:
There are two ways to play multiplayer:

1. Essential Mod (Recommended):
• Install Essential mod
• Add friends on social
• Host/join through Essential

2. Dedicated Server:
• Set up a dedicated server
• For Aternos: Change Simple Voice Chat port from 24454 to -1 in config

fields.name: How do I enter the backrooms?
fields.value:
To enter the Backrooms:
1. Dig a hole
2. Enclose yourself inside
3. Fill with sand/gravel to suffocate

You'll know it's working when:
• Static sounds play
• Screen goes black
• Cutscene shows you falling into Level 0

fields.name: Basic Game Mechanics
fields.value:
• Jumping is DISABLED in the Backrooms (prevents hunger loss)
• Press 'R' for flashlight (unusable in Poolrooms)
• Watch ceiling lights for orientation
• You need to travel 300+ blocks to find exits

fields.name: About the Levels
fields.value:
You must progress through all levels to escape:

1. Level 0 - The classic Backrooms (exit: white lights & staircase)
2. Level 1 - The Habitable Zone (exit: hole in wall with stairs)
3. Level 2 - Pipe Dreams
4. The Poolrooms (exit: giant tall room with pool)
5. The Infinite Grass Field (exit: giant pillars, some are fake)

fields.name: Common Error Solutions
fields.value:
1. Check your mods folder has:
• Fabric API
• GeckoLib
• Simple Voice Chat
• The mod itself

2. Common issues:
• Wrong mod loader (need Fabric, not Forge)
• Incompatible graphics mods
• Using Fabulous graphics
• Integrated graphics
• MacOS

fields.name: How do I install the mod?
fields.value: https://youtu.be/89AWIz0RtFw

fields.name: Will there be any new levels?
fields.value: At the moment, no. SP is currently busy working on a new video

fields.name: How do I get to the next level?
fields.value: Walk 300 blocks or more to start spawning exits and look around for one

fields.name: Level 0
fields.value: White lights, Staircase

fields.name: Level 1
fields.value: Hole in the wall with stairs

fields.name: Poolrooms
fields.value: Giant room with pool, really tall

fields.name: Infinite field
fields.value: Giant pillar, some of them are fake

fields.name: Is there a command to get to the next level?
fields.value: /level <level>

fields.name: Is there a way to remove the hint at the start of the game?
fields.value: You can change the option to enable / disable it in the mod settings (requires modmenu to see)
